'''Beta 1.8 Pre-release 2 ;)'''{{sic}} (''Beta 1.8-pre2'') is the second and last pre-release for [[Java Edition Beta 1.8]], released on September 13, 2011.<ref>{{tweet|jeb_|113600292104318978|Ok, so here's the second "pre-release," only use it if you know what to do with the JAR: http://assets.minecraft.net/1_8-pre2/minecraft.jar|September 13, 2011}}</ref><ref>{{tweet|jeb_|113602039375859712|The beta 1.8 pre-release 2 server is located here: http://assets.minecraft.net/1_8-pre2/minecraft_server.jar|September 13, 2011}}</ref>

An earlier instance of this version, from September 12, 2011, has also been found. In the earlier version, [[dead bush]]es are missing their tooltip, but apart from that and some other minor code differences, this version is identical. It is unknown if the September 12 version was publicly released.

== Additions ==

=== General ===
'''[[Options]]'''
* "Pick Block" can now be remapped.
* "Toggle Fog" can be remapped once again.

== Changes ==

=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Cracked Stone Bricks JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Cracked Stone Bricks]]'''
* Cracked stone bricks now drop themselves instead of regular stone bricks.

'''[[File:Dead Bush JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Dead Bush]]es'''
* Now have a tooltip.

'''[[File:Grass Block JE4.png|32px]] [[Grass Block]]'''
* Name changed from "Grass".

'''[[File:Mossy Stone Bricks JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Mossy Stone Bricks]]'''
* Mossy stone bricks now drop themselves instead of regular stone bricks.

'''[[File:Vines (N) JE1.png|32px]] [[Vines]]'''
* Now spread infinitely down, but do not spread if there are more than four other vine blocks nearby.

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Bone Meal JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Bone Meal]]'''
* Can now be used on [[pumpkin seeds]] and [[melon seeds]].
* [[Huge mushroom]]s can only be made if a mushroom is planted on grass or dirt.

'''{{Animate|Wooden Sword JE1 BE1.png; Stone Sword JE1 BE1.png; Iron Sword JE1 BE1.png; Golden Sword JE2 BE1.png; Diamond Sword JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Sword]]s'''
* Blocking now works in multiplayer.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Cave Spider JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Cave Spider]]s'''
* Now apply Poison correctly instead of doing so regardless of difficulty.

'''[[File:Squid JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Squid]]'''
* Now drop experience orbs when killed.

=== World generation ===
'''{{EnvLink|Mineshaft|Mineshaft}}'''
* Their density is now significantly decreased.
* Generate about 2.5 times as often.

'''{{EnvLink|Stronghold|Stronghold}}'''
* Increased stronghold count to three per map instead of one.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Controls]]'''
* Fog key mapped to {{key|F}}.
* {{key|F6}} and {{key|F7}} working as a result of left-in debug code not being removed.</onlyinclude>
* {{key|Shift}}+ clicking while crafting makes as much as possible and moves it straight to player's inventory.

'''[[Creative]]'''
* Some of the missing blocks are now on the creative selection screen.
* The player can no longer eat in Creative.

'''[[Drops]]'''
* Chickens and cows killed by burning now drop their cooked meat.

'''[[File:Experience Orb (sprite) Revision 1.gif]] [[Experience]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Experience Orb (sprite) Revision 3.png]].

=== General ===
'''[[Options]]'''
* "Generated Structures" is now on by default.

'''Fog'''
* Adjusted fog strength at low altitudes to be less extreme.

== Fixes ==
'''7 bugs fixed'''
* Fixed Endermen having client-side problems in multiplayer.
* Sprinting with right-click or sneaking is now fixed.
* Fixed Furnace tile entity crash.
* Fixed leaving the crafting table with items on the grid creating phantom blocks.
* Fixed singleplayer chunk memory leak.
* Fixed vines and leaves crashing the game when placed in the Nether.
* Fixed farmlands rejecting melon and pumpkin seeds.
